m:MaterialTitle.title: Date Picker Selection Types
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set easily the selection type of your datepicker by adding an attribute, selectionType='YEAR'. Here is the available formats [DAY, MONTH_DAY, YEAR_MONTH_DAY, YEAR]

m:MaterialTitle.title: Time Picker
m:MaterialTitle.description: Tap between the hour and minute label in the title bar to switch between the hour or minute view. Additionally, tap on the AM/PM label in the title bar to switch between AM or PM (in 12-hour clock mode).

m:MaterialTitle.title: Picker Orientations
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can easily change the orientation by: picker.setOrientation(Orientation.LANDSCAPE) for Java or orientation='LANDSCAPE' for UIBinder. Default is PORTRAIT.
